places_with_reviews.name: Madhubhan Resort & Spa
address: Anand - Sojitra Rd, Vithal Udyognagar, Vallabh Vidyanagar, Anand, Gujarat 388120, India

reviews.text:
They have a good quality service and very friendly staff.food is just awesome who love an Indian 🇮🇳 and South Gujarati Indian cuisines and for a diet people’s as well they have an options for breakfast.

Location is also very rich with a lot of environment friendly and green.at this moment weather is hot so you will feel a bit hotness in environment but better come here at winter ❄️

You will definitely get a peace ☮️ at this place and able to spend a quality time with a family.

Visited their restaurant for lunch. Found it to be amazing. The spread, the variety, staff support everything. Some people may find it to be expensive but they do provide the value and doesn't seem to be overpriced. Most of the items that we tried was good in taste, especially the sweets.

Stayed for a destination wedding for 2 nights. Rooms are very spacious and superb hospitality. House keeping is unbelievably quick. Being a huge resort, movement is a bit long in between rooms and restaurant and banquet. But they have an efficient cart support. Never even once had to walk, would always find a cart.

Food variety is good and everything is cooked to near perfection.

Had a wonderful time. Kudos to the wonderful team.

A great resort with utmost care of nature.....If someone really wants to spare time with family in quiet place, it's the right place.

Staff friendly.
Food quality very good.

Property being old more than 14 years now, it requires renovation of rooms on high priority as rooms are maintained below average in comparison to cost.

I had a wonderful experience staying at Madhubhan resort and Spa. The rooms were well-maintained and comfortable, and the room service was impressively fast. The staff was incredibly helpful and kind, always ready to assist with any requests or queries.

One of the highlights of my stay was the delicious food at the resort. Both breakfast and dinner offered a wide variety of options, ensuring that there was something for everyone's taste. The quality of food was excellent, and I thoroughly enjoyed every meal.

Overall, my stay at Madhubhan resort and Spa was truly amazing. The combination of great room service, friendly staff, and delectable food made it a memorable experience. I would highly recommend this resort to anyone looking for a fantastic getaway.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Blueivy
address: Hotel Blueivy, 80 Feet Rd, opposite Patcon House, Rajiv Nagar, Patel Chokdi, Vivekanand Wadi, Anand, Gujarat 388001, India

reviews.text:
Located in a well developed area. It's easy to reach over there. The rooms are very clean. The ambience of the hotel is pleasant. Service staff are humble and co-operative. They listen to you very carefully. I have visited this place mostly to attend wedding receptions or other medium size birthday parties. Their party hall is well suited for gatherings of 200-250 persons.

If you go to have lunch or dinner. It's a bit costly in terms of the amount of sabji compared to the cost of it. The quality of food is awesome. Hotel charges are also reasonable.

Blueivy is a hidden culinary gem! From the moment you step inside, the inviting ambiance sets the stage for an unforgettable dining experience. Each dish is a work of art, bursting with flavor and beautifully presented. The attentive staff adds to the overall charm, ensuring a memorable visit. Don't miss the opportunity to indulge in the exquisite cuisine at blueivy.

The dining experience at Blue Ivy was truly delightful. The food was not only delicious but also presented with attention to detail. The service was prompt and the staff exhibited a standard level of professionalism, ensuring a pleasant atmosphere. The environment itself was wonderful, contributing to a relaxing and enjoyable meal. Overall, a highly recommended dining destination for those seeking a combination of tasty cuisine, excellent service, and a great ambiance.

Great place to stay clean and nice rooms...very helpful staff front desk person Mr. Imran is helpful.
Good food.

We went there for lunch and i must say, they have a wide variety of dishes on their menu and everything had a unique taste.

Should definitely go if you are planning for lunch or dinner.

went lunch must say wide variety dishes menu everything unique taste definitely go planning lunch dinner

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Arizona Inn
address: Anand - Sojitra Rd, near Madhubhan Resort, Vithal Udyognagar, GIDC, Anand, Gujarat 388001, India

reviews.text: A very well maintained hotel. Rooms are spacious and clean. The location is very good. A high end shopping centre is just beside the hotel. Breakfast is well spread with South Indian food along with other items. The restaurant of the hotel is very well maintained and the food quality and quantity both are really good. Enough parking space for all kinds of vehicles.

Great stay, I was there for my first time a few days ago.
Overall excellent experience and service, bellmen were always on time and took care of all our items and requests.
Hotel overall does need some work as far as pests go - these were addressed but it is India so pests are expected.
I ask that front desk try to stay aware of these things before simply saying they’ll handle it.
Breakfast could use some more variety - seemed to be the same everyday vs what is advertised .
Recommend a stay here but will take a couple years before it’s at its full extent.
Some of the issues are simply due to India climate so that makes sense.

Constant odor in the room from the bathroom gutter.. Dirty carpet full of hair... Not vacuumed and dark spots everywhere. Plus, mosquitoes  by the dozens in the bedroom. Management had no answers for them. By the way, I paid a premium for the Suites Room. Also, the bath towels and bed sheets had blood stains on them. They replaced them, however, the next time they changed them out, they again put blood stained towels and sheets. Apparently, they don't do a good job of thoroughly washing or replacing towels and  bed sheets.

I have visited Arizona Hotel three times and each time it was marriage ceremony. It's a good place to be. Food is also of good quality. It's situated on the Anand Sojitra highway and easy to find. Beside Arizona Hotel is Maruti Solaris. Anyway, nice hotel and banquet.

This hotel is beyond your expectations.. I had booked it for 2 whole days for my marriage function and they just served our guests better than any 5 star hotels..Banquet Manger Mr. Jitu was standing there all the time to ensure the best service to be provided and the food was on top notch.. also the rooms were very neat and clean and room service was also upto the mark.. Arizona Inn staff made our special day more special as all the guests were happy and I think my wedding must be the 1st wedding where noone had a single complain about food or any service all thanks to Arizona team..

places_with_reviews.name: Nilkanth Resort and Party Plot
address: Lambhvel, Amar Cold Storge, Near, kanjri Road, Anand, Lambhvel, Gujarat 388310, India

reviews.text: Average venue for the international audience but perhaps locals would have less preferences around . Washrooms and hand washing facilities definitely require urgent attention and considerable efforts to achieve near acceptable level of hygiene. Overall just about 2 stars this time but hope to see this place doing and improving well soon.

Today Visited with Jlmorison India Ltd Gujarat Sales Team and Staff is very good and helpful, Room is very cleaning and Food is very fantastic, Location is Good

Thanks Nilkanth Resort Team
Excellent Rooms with courteous staff. Mr.Sandip and Mr.Girish both are very helpful… Will surely come back after sometime.
We recently attended a family event at the party venue. The space was spacious and could accommodate a large number of people.

Good Place to stay with family
Food quantity is good
Awesome service and supportive staff

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Darshan Inn
address: GWV2+5M9, Anand - Sojitra Rd, Sardar Nagar Society, Phase -IV, Karamsad, Anand, Gujarat 388325, India

reviews.text:
Especially Mr. Prakasbhai is very cordial,polite,quite listener and prompt in response.
All team at Darshan is very co operative and obedient. Services has been given with a smiling face.
Appreciate food quality ,ambience and overall experience was excellent.

Online Food Order Review from the Restaurant:
Every time I've ordered from the restaurant, I have always loved the food! They have a good variety in their menu, and overall I feel you can trust whatever you try to be delicious and fresh!

Paneer Bhurji - 10/10
Paneer Kadhai - 9/10 (you might need to dab out some oil that floats to the top while delivering, but other than that, it's great!)
Butter Chapati - 10/10 (one of the few resturants around which serve whole wheat and home-like chapatis)
Darshan Dum Biryani - 9/10

Today evening we ordered veg fried rice &veg.manchuriam with special note 0 spicy,but it was so 🥵 that my children unable to eat; same happened last month in dal tadka too..their chefs don't have customised menu,only cooks fix recipe food.
After notifying them reception(cashier )will say Sorry only. Totally useless..
Please this not first time ........

We had celebrated my Ring Ceremony here ar Darshan Inn.
Everything from food to the service was superb. Especially professionalism shown by Mr. Prakash Bhai is praiseworthy. He is a great guy and makes sure your function is executed smoothly. I would highly highly recommend this place for anyone looking organize any ceremony here.

Amazing, clean and well maintained rooms.
Hotel team are very responsive, helpful and polite, especially Atul and Adil. It has been a pleasure meeting you 😊.

The food was exceptional - no need to go outside the hotel to eat!

Coming back every year!

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel H
address: Hotel H, Anand - Vidyanagar Rd, Vivekanand Wadi, Anand, Gujarat 388001, India

reviews.text:
Overall a very decent hotel

Everything is ok in this hotel with the room size to cleanliness, although in a place like Anand this is one of the best you can get.

No complaint from the same.

Although it is not comparable to a 4 or 5 star hence 3 star given.

varieties available for ice cream & pastry !

The seating area is good and spacious so a big group can easily dine in , few options are available in coffee and snacks like sandwich and doughnut,

i visited during tea time at noon , and was quite satisfied with the quality and the quantity.

i noticed a wine store in this hotel , maybe convenient for the wine permit holders.

I love exploring various restaurants, hotels and cafe to enjoy delicious taste of food and beverages. I visited this place today with my friend and we had a cup of tea. We enjoyed spending our time, especially beautiful location.

Good experience at Hotel H! Rooms are super comfortable. Enough place for car parking. Food is amazing.

Few suggestions
1) Hotel should have in house car cleaner.
2) Hotel staff for Room keeping should have uniforms instead of Civil clothes.
3) Room dining should be made available 24/7 since people check in at different times of the day or atleast allow Zomato/ Swiggy.

Don't even feel like to give 1 star, I was there for 2.5 days and Internet didn't even worked for 5 minutes regular. I called receptions continuously and all they said is we are working on it but the staff they had the wifi access all the time. Secondly there is no hotwater facility and then whole night they do maintainance and preprations and then you won't be able to get proper sleep. Please book Hotel blue IV which is far better.

places_with_reviews.name: La Casa Inn Hotel & Restaurant
address: Anand - Sojitra Rd, near Ganesh Crossing, Mangalpura, Anand, Gujarat 388001, India

reviews.text:
Excellent place currently staying at La casa
Rooms are clean, service is excellent , great location as well.
Website advertises a gym/fitness center but that’s not included yet
Food/breakfast is great every morning
Front and House staff are always at your service
Of course the hotel has room to grow with keeping the rooms in shape, cleaning etc but with time this should happen.
It was nice restaurant but hotel rooms weren’t that good.
Good hotel in prime location in Anand near Ganesh Chokdi and Amul Dairy.
Best location  near expressed  highway & railway  stations  great meeting room &group lunch
Our ac was not working properly and we ask the boy who works there. Then we went out. When we came back it was fixed. Walking distance to the temple.

places_with_reviews.name: Hummingbird Hotel & Banquet
address: B/H Architect College Nr. University Library temple, Iskcon Rd, Mota Bazaar, Vallabh Vidyanagar, Anand, Gujarat 388120, India

reviews.text:
Recently dined at Hummingbird and was thoroughly impressed! The rooftop option added a charming touch to the cozy ambiance. They offer a diverse menu catering to both vegetarians and non-vegetarians, and the food was delightful. Whether you're in the mood for veggie delights or savory non-veg dishes, this place has you covered.

Loved the Chicken Kebabs!

If you’re look for clean fresh food .. look no further.. the vegetarian dish’s were tasty not over spiced and a delight to eat. The butter chicken was the first one I have had with the right  texture and gravy , it’s was buttery tasty not flowing with oil ..polished off with thin fluffy nans …under stated Resturant .. a must go if looking for quality food ..

The room were clean and beautiful, staff is helpful and cooperative especially thanks to Rakesh sir gives excellent service of hospitality. rooms is very good.I visited hotel for marriage function.
it was good banquet halls. We come here regularly for our birthday and anniversary celebrations. The stay and food is very good. The staff is very helpful and they ensure your stay is happy and comfortable.👍

I went to celebrate my son birthday with his friends in half day. It was amazing experience and wonderful time we spent there. The service and food with activities are awesome . Staff are very friendly, polite and helpful.and good rooms.

I stayed in your hotel for 3 days along with my close friend. We had come there to attend our college reunion in Jan 2023. We had a pleasant stay in the hotel and the staffs were also very good in their service.

Maintain this service quality and it is definitely value for money.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Rama Residency
address: Shree Ram Arcade, 3rd Floor, Old Gopal Cinema, Railway Station Rd, Ganesh Chokdi, Sardar Ganj, Anand, Gujarat 388001, India

reviews.text:
Our stay at Rama Residency in Anand earlier this year was a good experience overall. Situated in a perfect location, the hotel offered easy access to local shopping in the area.

While the rooms are dated, the comfort and warmth provided by the staff more than made up for it. Their attentive service and willingness to accommodate our needs ensured a pleasant and memorable stay. A special mention to the kitchen staff, especially Chef Pappu bhai. His food was very tasty, and he willingly accommodated our special dietary requests. Vaibhav bhai, the owner, was also prompt in addressing some issues with our room and took our suggestions on board.

Overall, Rama Residency met our expectations. With not many local options in the area, we would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone seeking a comfortable stay in Anand.

As a customer, he/she expect a good hospitality, service and food and which was satisfied by the HOTEL RAMA RESIDENCY..

Keep it up the same.....

BOSS IS AWESOME.....
AND
He is having cooperating nature...

FINALLY VERY VARY HAPPY..
Good rooms for the budget. Staff is very cooperative. Didn’t deny even smallest of requests. Breakfast was also good
Good hospitality and good food. Overall very good property at valuable rates.

Excellent hospitality, vary safe, neat and tidy all times, free internet , unmatched staff service, homely environment with home-like food taste, variety of breakfast recipes, polite owner and staff nature, centrally located in Anand. All aminities available.Laundary services. Best and value added hotel in town.

places_with_reviews.name: Surabhi Regency
address: Jay Tower, Amul Dairy Rd, Popati Nagar, Anand, Gujarat 388001, India

reviews.text: Spacious room, helpful staff and location also on main road, walkable distance for Amul factory, 5-7 mins drive to station.. just a suggestion for the management - pls have a shower curtain else bathroom becomes very wet once we take shower ..

Excellent Hotel with a very warm ambience, Hotel staff is extremely  courteous and polite. Rooms are cozy but washrooms can improve! Perfect location, right at the centre of things

Must stay hotel, if you're planning a trip to Anand!

Stayed here for almost 12 days. This was the best experience in Anand out of 4 hotels that I have stayed in in the past 6 months. Staff is extremely polite and diligent in work. The in house kitchen also has very good Punjabi food. The complimentary breakfast had two items everyday along with fruit, eggs and bread. I think it was very basic home like breakfast which u can actually have everyday, not very heavy or fancy. All in all, a very good experience. Will definitely stay at this hotel only for all visits to Anand in future. Thank u to the whole team

Overall, an excellent stay with good service. Rooms were clean and spacious. Close to Anand station. Room service for food was also good. They arranged cars as needed at very reasonable rates. Cars were also clean and drivers good. Minor suggestions to improve: Please keep a jestspray in washroom and provide an electric kettle with tea/coffee sachet
One of the finest hotel I have ever experienced in my life with all the excellent accommodation and also  marvelous staff
